all_concepts: High reliability due to absence of mechanical moving parts
Good chemical compatibility and no leakage thanks to fused glass technology
Easy replacement of electronic sensor without emptying or depressurizing the plant
Customizable delays and integrated status LED available on request
Optical level switch design for low viscosity liquids
technical_specs: The optical level switch LC-PH has been designed for use in level monitoring applications for the control of low viscosity liquids.
The sensor is suitable as minimum or maximum alarm.
natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for LC-PH?
Which refrigerants are compatible with LC-PH?

file_metadata.chunk_title: LC-PHup to 120 bar CO2 Oil Level Controller
key_concepts: High reliability due to absence of mechanical moving parts
Good chemical compatibility and no leakage thanks to fused glass technology
Easy replacement of electronic sensor without emptying or depressurizing the plant
Customizable delays and integrated status LED available on request
Optical level switch design for low viscosity liquids
iconic_quotes: The optical level switch LC-PH has been designed for use in level monitoring applications for the control of low viscosity liquids.
The sensor is suitable as minimum or maximum alarm.

qa_pairs.question: What pressure range does LC-PH support?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-PH supports up to 120 bar. The unit can be customized to meet specific application needs, including pressures beyond 120 bar.

qa_pairs.question: How does the electronic sensor replacement process work?
qa_pairs.answer: The electronic sensor can be easily replaced without emptying or depressurizing the plant due to its two-part design. This ensures minimal disruption to the system and maintains reliability.

qa_pairs.question: What are the benefits of using LC-PH in CO2 systems?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-PH is suitable for use in CO2 systems due to its optical level switch design and ability to detect low viscosity liquids. This ensures accurate monitoring and control of CO2 levels, which is critical for safe operation.

qa_pairs.question: How does the unit's connectivity capabilities work?
qa_pairs.answer: The LC-PH unit features revolutionary connectivity capabilities that enable seamless integration with various systems. This includes support for MODBUS RTU protocol and other communication protocols.

qa_pairs.question: What certifications does the LC-PH meet?
qa_pairs.answer: The LC-PH unit meets directives 2014/30/UE and 2014/35/UE, ensuring compliance with European safety standards.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for LC-PH?
Which refrigerants are compatible with LC-PH?
file_metadata.summary: The LC-PHup to 120 bar CO2 oil level controller features high reliability, good chemical compatibility, and easy replacement of electronic sensors. It also provides customizable delays, integrated status LED, and revolutionary connectivity capabilities.
